title: Grilled Salmon with Herbs
description: Simple and healthy grilled salmon with fresh herbs and lemon
instructions: Pat salmon fillets dry with paper towels.
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, dill, parsley, thyme, garlic, lemon zest, and lemon juice.
Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Brush herb mixture over salmon fillets.
Grill salmon skin-side down for 6-8 minutes.
Carefully flip and grill for 4-6 minutes more until fish flakes easily.
Remove from grill and let rest for 2-3 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges and additional herbs if desired.
notes: Don't overcook the salmon - it should still be slightly pink in the center. The fish will continue cooking slightly after removing from heat.
